about_the_game:
Note: This game is in early stage and is being heavily worked on, and there will be a lot of updates on the store page, so make sure to Follow to keep up and support the game, it means a lot!

PAWN LEGENDS


It is time to make the dream a reality! -Name's Mick, and you have a Pawn Shop on your hands, located at the beautiful Sunset Bay. Your success is determined by your ambition- pick your route and create your own unique business, and perhaps even more...


Into the Spiral


Transform your little shop into the biggest business in Sunset Bay! From small beginnings to big winnings, that is the only way to the top.

  • Transform and invest in your shop, keep track of the stats and economy. Purchase items in person or choose from 100s of online items to order, to bring your shop to perfection! Expand and Renovate your shop, just the way you want it. Make it Antique or make it Cyberpunk, it is up to you!

  • Hire and Fire Staff, manage your efficiency, find skilled workers and partners which is crucial to reach the top. Upgrade the knowledge base of your staff to make them overall better workers and avoid losing your money to instead be a valuable part of your shop.

  • Buy and Discover items from all around the Island! From finding jewellery on the beach, to purchasing abandoned Storage Lockers or Scouting the old Antique Shops to find the Holy Grail. You can pick any route you want, and roll with it, all doors are open!


  • Sell Anything. Pretty self-explanatory. You can sell books or you can sell video games. You can sell skateboards or you can sell cars and bikes (pimp them too!). Pick your poison and make it your thing!


  • Meet important partners and experts which will aid you in your journey- As a businessman you will meet various other potential partners with whom you can make deals in order to help you or your shop.


  • Grow your personal Stats to become the best you- or the bad you, depends what you prefer... There are 5 stats which describe Mick, aka. you. These are: Reasoning, Sympathy, Manipulation, Intimidation and Karma. These stats will constantly vary depending on your decision making.


  • Take over the Sunset Bay! In this beautiful city of opportunity, take your ambitions to reality, and become the Man, the Myth, the Legend Mick.

    You can be your own Mick in October! (hopefully) - So make sure to Wishlist the game if you like it, to support further development!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Additional Notes: SSD preferred
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • Additional Notes: SSD preferred

short_description: Welcome to the most realistic Pawn Shop Simulator out there! It is time to make the dream a reality-open your own unique Pawn Shop in stunning Sunset Bay, and become #1 Pawn Shop in the Region! Pawn Shop Management, Buy and Sell, Negotiate, Upgrade and Expand, and so much more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
